import { Col, Row } from 'react-grid-system'; import { useState } from 'react'; import profilepic from '../Images/yohan.profile.png' import opentowork from '../Images/Opentowork.png' import clientlogo from '../Images/client.logo.png' import serverlogo from '../Images/server.logo.png' import databaselogo from '../Images/database.logo.png' import technionlogo from '../Images/technion.logo.png' import devbg from '../Images/dev.bg.png' import mernproject from '../Images/mern.project.png' import WelcomeComp from './Welcome'; import html from '../Images/icons/html.svg' import css from '../Images/icons/css.svg' import javascript from '../Images/icons/javascript.svg' import typescript from '../Images/icons/typescript.svg' import react from '../Images/icons/react.svg' import angular from '../Images/icons/angular.svg' import csharp from '../Images/icons/c-sharp.svg' import express from '../Images/icons/express.svg' import dotnet from '../Images/icons/dotnet.svg' import node from '../Images/icons/node.svg' import graphql from '../Images/icons/graphql.svg' import mongodb from '../Images/icons/mongodb.svg' import sql from '../Images/icons/sql.svg' function HomeComp() { const [page, setPage] = useState("Home"); return (


Yohan Arejouane

Full Stack Developer

Tel Aviv, Israel

My Stack


Projects:

3

Certified by:



Future Project:

Airline Booking Web App

Description:

After many years dealing with Air Transportation i decided to use my experience and my passion for this industry to create my first private and ambitious project. The idea is to use all the knowledge i have from my B.A Degree in Tourism Managemnt and my experience working for the national Airline company of Israel to try and create the most "User Firendly" Airline booking system with some personal innovations that could change the experience of booking tickets and managing them both for the customer and the company.

Stack:































); } export default HomeComp;
